channel.title: Exact amount of squares in RuneScape?
channel.description:
Anyone have an idea of how many squares (the ground spots) are in RuneScape?
I was just wondering, because I want to do a non-pk server, and I'll just do like safeZone = 1 | 4000 or what ever it was for safe zones..
